short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powered by Google Easy Nepali Typing provides easy and convinent ways to type in Nepali using English Alphabets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
नेपालीमा टाईप गर्नुस - Easy Nepali Typing - Nepali Typing Never Been So EASY.

How to Use? 

For e.g., "Tapai Lai Kasto chha" becomes "तपाई लाई कस्तो छ".
